info.title: ServiceNow MCP
info.description: Comprehensive ServiceNow connector based on the Zurich release REST APIs. Includes Table, Attachment, Aggregate, Import Set, CMDB Instance, Service Catalog, Batch, Knowledge Management, Email, Performance Analytics, Change Management, User Administration, and Event Management APIs. MCP-enabled for Copilot Studio integration.
